title: YUSA Solr 8.x
description: Provide solr 8 for YUSA OpenY sites

env.name: SITE_ID
env.label: YUSA Site ID
env.description: Site ID, like prelive-4548-openy-ymcagreensboro. Ensure that site id have prefix with instance environment like live, prelive, staging

env.name: BASIC_AUTH
env.label: Basic Auth
env.description:
replace symbol $ by double symbol $$ for escape when insert new password. To generate hash for password run locally: docker run --rm -it caddy caddy hash-password.
 Example $$2a$$14$$fpPuWjlHDI5MlTj7LGL3FOkha6SAem3EbBoF6B90801fOjxu25wXO
